title: 测试课程 - 编辑器功能验证
content: This is a test lesson for the lesson editor functionality. It contains sample English content to verify that the import feature works correctly. The lesson editor allows users to import new lessons through file upload or clipboard paste operations.

sentences.text: The lesson editor allows users to import new lessons.
sentences.note: 这句话说明了课程编辑器允许用户导入新课程。

sentences.text: It contains sample English content to verify functionality.
sentences.note: 这句话表达了包含示例英文内容来验证功能的意思。
